name: FireWood (itch)
description:
It's winter, and you'll need a lot of fire wood for your fire to survive the night!

Collect sticks and bring them back to the fire before it burns out.  
Be quick, you can't stay outside after sunset.

*Use of a dual-joystick controller recommended but not required

**Requires a "good" graphics card to run smoothly.   It will be laggy on something like an Intel 620, but should run fine on a GTX 1050.
